translation.en: -Mommy, I'm sleepy. -Shh, shh.
Shh, shh. Let's go.
Daddy.

-"Shoop." -Shh, shh.
What are you doing?
-[banging on hood] -Hey, what are you doing?
Hey, wait!
Ten on 2, please.

translation.en: Leave a message or don't, you do you.

translation.en: I'm gonna find us some place to sleep. I'll be right back.

translation.en: -Alex? -Thank God you're here.
I'm sorry to barge in like this. I called you, you didn't pick up.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich so reinplatze. Du bist nicht rangegangen.

translation.en: -I didn't know where else to go. -What's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.de: -Ich wusste nicht, wohin. -Was ist los? Ist alles ok?

translation.en: It's not Maddy, is it?
No, Maddy and I just need a place to crash for tonight.
translation.de: Nein, wir brauchen nur einen Schlafplatz.

translation.en: Can I crash here until I figure out what I'm doing?
translation.de: Kann ich hier schlafen, bis ich weiter weiß?

translation.en: God, of course. Get in here.
-Are the guys from the Swan here? -Yeah.
Thought I heard your voice. Come inside. We got some sick dank from Humboldt.
translation.de: Dachte ich doch, dass du das bist. Komm. Wir haben krasses Gras da.

translation.en: -[man 1] Gotta get it. -[man 2] Do it.
-Yeah. -All right. Pass it. Chill.
-Next time. -Come on. He's already on his way over.
translation.de: -Ein andermal. -Komm. Er ist schon unterwegs hierher.

translation.en: He knows he drank too much. Hear him out. He wants to talk.
translation.de: Er weiß, er hat zu viel getrunken. Er will mit dir reden.

translation.en: -Don't be a bitch. -Ethan!
-Sorry-- -I'm good. I'm all right.
It's okay.
-Do you have some place to go? -I'm good.
-[cell phone pings] -Mm-mm.
"Shoop" is asleep, Maddy.
Can you try to close your eyes?
Okay, I know you want "Shoop."
I know you want "Shoop."
Mommy wants to ask the last owner if he jammed any other mixtape in here.
translation.de: Mommy will den Vorbesitzer fragen, ob er noch andere Kassetten hat.

translation.en: -Hey, there we go. There we go. -["Shoop" playing over stereo]
[Maddy] Mommy.
That's okay. We're gonna freestyle it. That's what we're gonna do.
translation.de: Alles gut. Wir machen das so. Das geht auch ohne.

translation.en: ♪ You're packed and you're stacked 'Specially in the back ♪

translation.en: ♪ If looks could kill... ♪
Gotta move, ma'am. You can't sleep here.
translation.de: Ma'am. Sie können hier nicht schlafen.

translation.en: You can't sleep here.
-Isn't this public property? -You can't park here.
translation.de: -Das ist ein öffentlicher Ort. -Das geht nicht.

translation.en: Got nowhere to be, go to a Walmart parking lot or to social services.
translation.de: Fahren Sie auf einen Walmart-Parkplatz oder zum Sozialamt.

translation.en: Okay.
Now.
Okay.
[man] Russell.
That's us. Let's get it.
-Russell? -[Alex] Russell, coming.
So you're looking for a big, fat government handout
translation.de: Sie wollen also Geld vom Staat,

translation.en: because you are a jobless, white trash, piece of shit, am I right?
translation.de: weil sie eine arbeitslose Asi-Braut sind, ja?

translation.en: What?
Your form? You're gonna give that to me.
translation.de: Ihr Formular? Können Sie mir das geben?

translation.en: Yes.
All right. The child in your lap is Maddy.
-And Schmariel. -What?
Uh, it's the Ariel that we got from a dollar store.
translation.de: Das ist die Ariel vom Dollar-Laden.

translation.en: So we call her Schmariel.
-Are you the child's legal guardian? -[Alex] Yes.
Can you prove that?
Uh, I can show you my stretch marks.
Are you under the influence of any drugs or alcohol?

translation.en: No.
Are you sure?
Because you look strung out.
No.
We slept in a car last night.
So you're homeless?
No. No, I wouldn't say that.
translation.de: Nein. Das würde ich nicht sagen.

translation.en: So you have a home?
I had a home and then we left it.
translation.de: Ich hatte eins. Wir sind abgehauen.

translation.en: Maddy's dad is, um-- He drinks and, uh...
He blacks out and punches stuff.
translation.de: Er hat Blackouts, schlägt auf Sachen ein.

translation.en: Is this some kind of fucking fairy tale, Alex?
-[Jody] Punches you? -No.
-Punches Maddy? -[Alex] No. No.
Just...
Last night, um...
Last night was different and I got scared.
translation.de: Da war es anders, ich bekam Angst.

translation.en: Did you file a police report?
translation.de: Haben Sie es der Polizei gemeldet?

translation.en: No.
Do you wanna call the cops now? It's not too late.
translation.de: Wollen Sie das jetzt noch machen?

translation.en: And say what? That he didn't hit me?
translation.de: Und sagen, er hat mich nicht geschlagen?

translation.en: There's shelters for domestic violence victims, but you need to go on record with your abuse.
translation.de: Es gibt Frauenhäuser, aber Sie müssen die häusliche Gewalt melden.

translation.en: I'm not abused.
Okay, hon.
So according to you, you're not abused and you're not homeless.
translation.de: Es gab keine Gewalt, obdachlos sind Sie auch nicht.

translation.en: Why are you here?
We don't have anywhere to sleep tonight.
What about mom? It says here she's local.
translation.de: Und Ihre Mutter? Sie wohnt hier.

translation.en: I would rather sleep in my car.
Dad?
My family is not an option.
Are you currently employed?
-Nope. -You went to six different high schools?
Yeah, my mom moved around a lot and then eventually I got my GED in 2016.
translation.de: Meine Mutter ist oft umgezogen. Ich habe 2016 meinen externen Abschluss gemacht.

translation.en: Any college, technical schools?
I got into college...
um, but I didn't go.
Is there anything that you can give me?
Any special skills?
On your mark, get set, go!
No.
All right. Here's the deal.
I need two pay stubs in order to get you on the list for subsidized housing,
translation.de: Ich brauche zwei Lohnabrechnungen für die Sozialwohnungsliste,

translation.en: and even then, the wait list is long.
In the meantime, there's a mission over at St. Carmel's and they have beds open.
translation.de: Es gibt eine Missionsstation, da sind noch Betten frei.

translation.en: I can't take Maddy there.
translation.de: Da kann ich nicht mit Maddy hin.

translation.en: Sure you can.
Get there early. Wear Deet.
translation.de: Fahren Sie früh hin. Benutzen Sie Insektenspray.

translation.en: Um, I'm sorry. Is there anything else that you could do for us here?
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Können Sie noch irgendwas für uns tun?

translation.en: Honestly, without a job,
I can't do squat.
Okay. Um...
I can't get a job if I can't afford day care.

translation.en: Well, we have access to subsidized day care grants once you have a job.

translation.en: I need a job to prove that I need day care in order to get a job?

translation.en: What kind of fuckery is that?
translation.de: Was ist das für ein Scheiß?

translation.en: You know what?
Why don't you try this?
translation.de: Probieren Sie das hier doch mal.

translation.en: It's a local cleaning service, lot of turnover. Worth a shot.

translation.en: I'll call them to tell them you're on your way.
translation.de: Ich rufe die an, dass Sie kommen.

translation.en: -Great. Yeah. Thank you. -[Jody] Yeah?
Can I bring Maddy?
To a job interview?
Is Paula here?
I don't know who Paula is. We Airbnb'd this place from Basil.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wer Paula ist. Basil hat uns das über Airbnb vermietet.

translation.en: -Hi, Mom. -[shouts]
This is so exciting.
I can't believe you came to see this.
translation.de: Toll, dass ihr euch das anschaut!

translation.en: This is what all the brilliant painters and sculptors are doing in the art world.
translation.de: Das machen gerade alle genialen Maler und Bildhauer.

translation.en: This is me stepping up to a global collective of minds.

translation.en: -Hey, Mom. -Archetypes. You know about it.
That's what I'm representing here in cobalt.
translation.de: Das repräsentiere ich hier in Kobalt.

translation.en: The hero, the every man, mentor, the mystic -the lover. -Mom.
And there's Jungian archetypes.
Why didn't you tell me that you Airbnb'd your house?
translation.de: Du vermietest dein Haus über Airbnb?

translation.en: I did, didn't I?
I drove around two campgrounds looking for you.
translation.de: Ich habe dich auf zwei Campingplätzen gesucht.

translation.en: If you don't check-in with me, that's on you.
translation.de: Selbst schuld, wenn du dich nie meldest.

translation.en: I called you 14 times.
[Basil] Is that Alexandra? Bloody hell.
You disturbed the Airbnb people?
They're gonna leave a shit review now, you fair dinkum monster.
translation.de: Die hinterlassen eine schlechte Bewertung, Trottel.

translation.en: I can't deal with him and his fake Australian accent.
It's not fake. I was born in Perth, so...
translation.de: Der ist nicht falsch. Ich bin in Perth geboren.

translation.en: -I'm sure you were, Cilantro. -Don't call Basil Cilantro, Alex.
Our identity is subjective.
He's Australian, I'm French-Italian.
translation.de: Er ist Australier, ich bin französisch…

translation.en: In reality, we're both 100 percent Icelandic fairy.
translation.de: In Wahrheit sind wir isländische Feen.

translation.en: Can I talk to you in private? I'm in a rush, Mom.
translation.de: Kann ich dich alleine sprechen? Es eilt.

translation.en: No. Whatever you can say to me, you can say in front of him.
translation.de: Nein. Was du mir sagst, kann du auch vor ihm sagen.

translation.en: Because he is my life and business partner.
translation.de: Er ist mein Lebens- und Geschäftspartner.

translation.en: What business?
Renting your house out, or making you sleep in an RV?

translation.en: You're a malignant tumor.
-Go put some shrimp on the barbie. -All right. Enough.
Out with it.
-With--? Um... -Out with it.
You want something from me, so just ask. What is it?

translation.en: Can you watch Maddy? I have a job interview. One hour, two max.
translation.de: Kannst du auf Maddy aufpassen? Ich habe ein Vorstellungsgespräch.

translation.en: Of course. She's my granddaughter.
She is always welcome to experience me and be a part of my life.
translation.de: Sie darf mich immer erleben, an meinem Leben teilhaben.

translation.en: Do you remember the rules? Use your phone.
Use your phone and answer the phone. Okay, Mom?

translation.en: -Nod that you hear me. -Nod.
Don't drive her anywhere. Do you have food here? Can you give her lunch?
translation.de: Fahr sie nirgendwohin. Kannst du ihr etwas zu essen geben?

translation.en: -We're a pub now, are we? -Anything goes wrong, call me.
translation.de: -Sind wir ein Lokal? -Ruf an, wenn was ist.

translation.en: Don't call Sean. Call me.
Come on, pumpky-poo.
Be a good girl for Grammy and Cilantro. Love you.
translation.de: Sei brav bei Omi und Koriander. Hab dich lieb.

translation.en: [Maddy] Bye, Mom!
I love you!
Put some eyes on her.
Hi, I'm looking for Value Maids?
Sorry, the address says it's here.
Thank you.
[Yolanda] Yeah?
Hi, are you Yolanda?
If this is another summons, shove it up your ass.
translation.de: Wenn das wieder eine Vorladung ist: Ich scheiß drauf.

translation.en: No, I'm Alex. Jody sent me.
translation.de: Nein, ich bin Alex. Jody schickt mich.

translation.en: Oh, one of Jody's girls.
Poor thing. Not you. Jody. Being a social worker sucks.
translation.de: Armes Ding. Nicht Sie. Jody. Sozialarbeit ist scheiße.

translation.en: So you're on parole?
Um, no.
-Got any priors? -No.
I'll check. Got a problem with a background check?

translation.en: -No. -We pay that, no exceptions.
Bump you up 50 cents once the background check clears and you go full-time.
translation.de: Plus 50 Cent nach der Hintergrundprüfung und bei Vollzeit.

translation.en: Full-time, great.
Yes, but full-time ain't a 40-hour week.
translation.de: Ja, aber Vollzeit sind nicht 40 Stunden die Woche.

translation.en: Company policy is you can't work more than six hours a day.
translation.de: Mehr als sechs Stunden pro Tag geht nicht.

translation.en: More than six hours, bitches start throwing their backs out,
translation.de: Sonst verrenken die Weiber sich den Rücken.

translation.en: which breaks my heart, it does, but I can't be paying benefits.
translation.de: Und ich kann leider keine Versicherung zahlen.

translation.en: So it's capped. Six hours a day, max.
translation.de: Also: sechs Stunden am Tag, höchstens.

translation.en: Okay.
And tourist season's over, so I really only have one shift open.
translation.de: Und die Touri-Saison ist vorbei, also habe ich nur eine Schicht.

translation.en: It's a weekly three-hour clean over on Fisher Island.
translation.de: Einmal wöchentlich drei Stunden auf Fisher Island.

translation.en: One shift. Okay.
So uniform is 25 bucks. Comes out of your first check.
translation.de: Die Uniform kostet $25. Wird vom ersten Gehalt abgezogen.

translation.en: How soon do you think I could get proof of employment? A pay stub.

translation.en: Cart before the horse. This is a trial.
translation.de: Eins nach dem anderen. Erst mal zur Probe.

translation.en: You ain't hired yet.
-You got a car? -Yes.
We provide a ferry pass.
But gas and toll, that's on you.
So are cleaning supplies, rags, gloves,
translation.de: Und die Putzsachen auch, Lappen, Handschuhe,

translation.en: basically everything else except the Dyson.
If you don't return the Dyson to me directly after the shift,
translation.de: Wenn Sie mir den nicht sofort zurückbringen,

translation.en: -you don't get paid. Understand? -Yes, I do.
All right. Can you do there at 1:00? Let me get you the sheet.
translation.de: Ok. Können Sie um 13 Uhr da sein? Ich hole Ihren Zettel.

translation.en: Oh, so I'm starting today?
That's good news, ain't it, broke girl?
Great.
-[Paula on phone] Hello. -[Alex] Hey, Mom. How's it going?
[Paula] She's a very powerful archetype.
A love child. That's what she is, her spirit resounds.

translation.en: -Did you feed her? -The spirit of my mother is in her.
translation.de: -Hat sie gegessen? -Meine Mutter ist in ihr.

translation.en: She is a very powerful young lady. Our ancestry pulses through her blood.
translation.de: Sie ist eine starke junge Dame. Unsere Ahnen pulsieren in ihrem Blut.

translation.en: Sure does. Did you end up giving her lunch, though?

translation.en: Of course. Grilled cheese and tomato with a side of straight Tom Collins
and now we are painting.
-Aren't we, sweetie? We're painting. -Awesome.
Hey. So listen. I got hired and I'm starting right now.

translation.en: You should see what she's doing. And her hands, they're like sculptures.
translation.de: Das solltest du sehen. Ihre Hände sind wie Skulpturen.

translation.en: -Listen, I'm starting right now. -Oh, honey. It's just so pretty.
translation.de: -Hör zu, ich fange sofort an. -Oh, Süße. Das ist so hübsch.

translation.en: -Her painting. -It's a three-hour clean on Fisher Island.
translation.de: -Ihr Gemälde. -Drei Stunden putzen auf Fisher Island.

translation.en: You should see her hands! Look at her hands!
translation.de: Du solltest ihre Hände sehen! Ihre Hände!

translation.en: I'll be back at the ferry at 4:05 and I'll be at yours at 5:30. Does that work?
translation.de: Ich nehme die Fähre um 16:05 Uhr und bin um 17:30 Uhr bei dir. Geht das?

translation.en: Don't we, sweetie?
No phones. You're a half hour late.
translation.de: Keine Handys. Sie haben eine halbe Stunde Verspätung.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm-- -A half hour late.
I know. I didn't have any signal and missed my turn. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Ich hatte keinen Empfang und habe die Abbiegung verpasst.

translation.en: We'll reschedule.
I can be done by 4:00, ma'am. I'm fast and I'm good.
translation.de: Ich schaffe das bis 16 Uhr. Ich bin schnell und gut.

translation.en: I'd really rather you come back another time than do a shoddy job and throw a bunch of cleaning products around.
translation.de: Mir wäre es lieber, Sie kommen wieder, statt jetzt schlechte Arbeit zu leisten.

translation.en: I understand. I won't disappoint you.
translation.de: Das verstehe ich. Ich werde Sie nicht enttäuschen.

translation.en: We're in NYC this weekend. Everything in the fridge can go
translation.de: Wir sind in New York. Alles im Kühlschrank muss raus,

translation.en: so my whole house doesn't smell like kombucha when I get back. Got it?
translation.de: damit das Haus nicht nach Kombucha riecht, wenn ich wiederkomme. Klar?

translation.en: The fridge. I got it.
We compost. The bin is labeled "compost." Can you read or should I show you?
translation.de: Wir kompostieren. Auf dem Eimer steht "Kompost". Können Sie lesen?

translation.en: I can read.
Oh, God. Just put them on. I'll talk to her.

translation.en: Tell them those terms are bullshit.
Okay.
Tick-tock. Should have rescheduled.
[Maddy] Mommy.
It's a tiara.
[Maddy] Mommy, are you okay?
-[Regina] Are you okay? -[Maddy] Are you okay, Mommy?
Are you okay?
Why are you on the floor?
Oh, what happened?
I heard a thunk. I think you fainted.
translation.de: Ich hörte was. Ich glaube, Sie sind ohnmächtig geworden.

translation.en: Or are you a drug addict?
Uh, no. Um...
I'm so sorry. I skipped breakfast this morning. I'm fine.
translation.de: Tut mir sehr leid. Ich habe nicht gefrühstückt. Alles ok.

translation.en: Okay, well, just hold on. Don't get up fast.
translation.de: Ok, warten Sie. Nicht schnell aufstehen.

translation.en: Fuck.
Okay.
Balance bar.
Thank you.
This room is so nice.
Gosh, I've got a daughter and she would love this. How old is your kid?
translation.de: Meine Tochter würde es lieben. Wie alt ist Ihr Kind?

translation.en: I don't have children.
Isn't this a nursery?
Yeah, it's staged.
We're getting ready to sell the house. So, uh... James had it staged.
translation.de: Wir wollen das Haus verkaufen, also hat James es so einrichten lassen.

translation.en: Well...
Not to be a task master, but...
Obviously. Of course. I'm almost done too.
I just have this room left and...
This room and all the lawn furniture.
Shit.
[voicemail] Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.

translation.en: Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.de: Ihr Anruf wird an die Mailbox weitergeleitet.

translation.en: Maddy, are you in here? Maddy?
translation.de: Maddy, bist du da drinnen? Maddy?

translation.en: Mom, can't you hear me calling? What the fuck?
translation.de: Mom, hörst du mich nicht? Was ist?

translation.en: Calling me? It was me that was calling you many, many times.
translation.de: Ob ich dich höre? Ich habe dich angerufen, viele, viele Male.

translation.en: -Okay. Where is Maddy? -I have a life of my own, you know?
translation.de: -Ok. Wo ist Maddy? -Ich habe auch ein Leben.

translation.en: I can't be watching children all day. I have work to do. My own work, okay?
translation.de: Ich kann nicht den ganzen Tag auf Kinder aufpassen. Ich muss meine Arbeit machen.

translation.en: Basil, are you in here? Open the door!
translation.de: Basil, bist du da drin? Mach auf!

translation.en: I bet you'd like to get in there with him. I see how you act around him.
translation.de: Du würdest bestimmt gerne da rein mit ihm. Ich sehe, wie du dich aufführst mit ihm.

translation.en: Always flirting with him, sticking your little titties out.
translation.de: Wie du flirtest, deine Titten rausstreckst.

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about? Where is Maddy?
translation.de: Was redest du da? Wo ist Maddy?

translation.en: -I'm taking a nap. Jesus. -Why can't you be happy for me?
translation.de: -Ich schlafe hier. Mann. -Wieso freust du dich nicht für mich?

translation.en: She's not here.
That I can still attract a quality man like him.
translation.de: Dass ich noch so einen Mann kriegen kann.

translation.en: -Okay, where is she? -We couldn't reach you
translation.de: -Ok, wo ist sie? -Wir haben dich nicht erreicht,

translation.en: and your mom got tired, so we called Sean to get her.
translation.de: deine Mutter wurde müde, also haben wir Sean angerufen.

translation.en: You have never seen my potential. I am soaring on the cliff.
translation.de: Du hast mein Potenzial nie gesehen. Ich schwebe auf der Klippe.

translation.en: The sun beams towards me. It fills me with light!
translation.de: Die Sonne scheint mir entgegen. Sie füllt mich mit Licht!

translation.en: She's fine. She's all right. She's asleep.
translation.de: Es geht ihr gut. Sie schläft.

translation.en: We did bath time.
She had buttered noodles.
You hungry?
Dinner's almost ready.
Irish stew.
[screams] Fuck!
I haven't had a drink today. Come on.

translation.en: I'm trying here.
I'm not staying for dinner. I'm getting Maddy and I'm leaving.
translation.de: Ich bleibe nicht zum Essen. Ich hole Maddy ab.

translation.en: I went to a meeting today.
Ethan took me.
Okay. That's...
Could you please sit?
-All right. Let's make a fucking mess! -[Maddy crying]
You need to eat.
Come on.
I'm surprised Maddy was at your mom's.
translation.de: Ich war überrascht, dass Maddy bei deiner Mutter war.

translation.en: Is Paula finally on meds, or...?
She was only supposed to be there a couple of hours.
translation.de: Sie sollte nur zwei Stunden da sein.

translation.en: You know how much I love Paula.
I do, but... leaving Maddy with her?
translation.de: Wirklich. Aber Maddy bei ihr zu lassen?

translation.en: I thought we had an agreement.
My mom's good with her for short periods of time.
translation.de: Meine Mutter kann gut mit ihr, wenn es kurz ist.

translation.en: They, um... dance around or do art projects.
translation.de: Sie tanzen und machen Kunst zusammen.

translation.en: She was alone when I got there.
translation.de: Sie war alleine, als ich kam.

translation.en: Playing with a vape and watching a cage match on TV.
translation.de: Spielte mit einem Vaporizer und schaute einen Käfigkampf im Fernsehen.

translation.en: Where were you? Nobody could find you.
translation.de: Wo warst du? Keiner konnte dich finden.

translation.en: I got a job on Fisher Island, and I didn't have service.
translation.de: Bei einem Job auf Fisher Island, hatte keinen Empfang.

translation.en: A job?
How are you gonna work? Who's gonna watch Maddy?
translation.de: Wie willst du arbeiten? Wer passt auf Maddy auf?

translation.en: Not your mom.
I'll figure it out. It's my business, Sean, okay?
translation.de: Das wird schon. Das ist meine Sache.

translation.en: Could you eat a little?
You're hurting my feelings.
I'm not eating your fucking stew, okay?
Stop asking.
All right.
You're officially freaking me out.
translation.de: Jetzt mache ich mir echt Sorgen.

translation.en: Going AWOL in the middle of the night?
translation.de: Du haust mitten in der Nacht ab?

translation.en: Leaving my child in a dangerous situation with a batshit crazy person?
translation.de: Lässt mein Kind in einer gefährlichen Situation mit einer Irren?

translation.en: I mean, are you feeling okay?
-That's not funny. Don't do that. -What?
I'm not insane. You're the one that woke me up in a rage
translation.de: Ich bin nicht verrückt. Du hast mich aufgeweckt, in Rage

translation.en: over some dirty dishes and punched a hole in the wall.
translation.de: wegen schmutzigem Geschirr. Ein Loch in die Wand gehauen.

translation.en: I drank too much. I went too far.
translation.de: Ich hatte zu viel getrunken, ging zu weit.

translation.en: I went too far, I'm sorry.
translation.de: Ich bin zu weit gegangen, es tut mir leid.

translation.en: I picked glass out of Maddy's hair last night.
translation.de: Ich habe Glasstücke aus Maddys Haaren gepult.

translation.en: I didn't mean for it to be that close to her.
translation.de: Ich wollte nicht, dass sie das trifft.

translation.en: Hey, I would never hurt her, you know that.
translation.de: Ich würde ihr nie wehtun, das weißt du.

translation.en: I don't know that.
You serious right now?
Okay, what's the plan here?
Where are you gonna go? Hmm?
I pay all the bills.
Let you hang out with my friends,
translation.de: Ich lasse dich mit meinen Freunden abhängen,

translation.en: I let you move into my trailer, you drink my beer, eat my food.
translation.de: in meinem Wohnwagen wohnen, mein Bier trinken, mein Essen essen.

translation.en: I let you mooch off me.
I do everything for you.
If you walk out of here, you'll have no one.
translation.de: Wenn du gehst, hast du niemanden.

translation.en: I know. I'm well aware of how completely alone and fucked I am.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wie allein und am Arsch ich sein werde.

translation.en: But I won't pick glass out of Maddy's hair again. Not gonna happen.
translation.de: Aber ich pule nie wieder Glas aus Maddys Haaren.

translation.en: Hey, where are you going?
-Hey. Hey, Maddy, sweetie. -Daddy.
Daddy's right here, okay?
Where are you going, Alex?
What's the plan here?
Okay, why don't you think for just one second?
Would you please look at me? Alex?
translation.de: Schaust du mich bitte an? Alex?

translation.en: Why don't you come back inside?
-We can talk about this. -There you go, honey. It's okay.
Where are you gonna go?
Hey, you can't steal my kid!
translation.de: Du kannst mein Kind nicht klauen!

translation.en: Sweetie, Daddy's right here, okay? Where are you gonna go?
translation.de: Süße, Daddy ist hier, ok? Wo willst du hin?

translation.en: [Maddy] "Shoop."
"Shoop," Mommy.
-Where are we going? -I don't know. I need a second, all right?
translation.de: -Wo fahren wir hin? -Ich weiß nicht. Ich brauche eine Sekunde.

translation.en: -Home. -We can't go home right now, okay?
Look, Mommy, look.
I'm gonna take this real quick.
Yolanda, the Dyson, I know.
-Regina's not happy with your cleaning. -What?
She called and said you did a crap job on the furniture, left streaks.
translation.de: Sie sagt, Sie haben Schlieren auf den Möbeln hinterlassen.

translation.en: -Go back, and do it right. -Window, Mommy!
-Yes, honey. -Mommy.
Okay, okay, hold on. I'm gonna...
Nope, I can't. I'm in Port Hampstead, and I have my daughter with me.
translation.de: Das geht nicht. Ich bin in Port Hampstead, ich habe meine Tochter dabei.

translation.en: Not my problem. You want this job? You wanna get paid? Go back.
translation.de: Nicht mein Problem. Wollen Sie den Job? Ihr Geld? Dann hin da.

translation.en: -It's a 45-minute ferry each way. -Then you better get cracking.
translation.de: -Die Fähre dauert 45 Minuten. -Dann beeilen Sie sich.

translation.en: You're flying. [giggling]
-Hold on, all right? -Look, Mommy.
We don't have time for this, Maddy.
translation.de: Wir haben keine Zeit dafür, Maddy.

translation.en: Schmariel! [screaming]
We'll go back and get Schmariel. We're gonna get Schmariel later.
translation.de: Wir fahren nachher zurück und holen Schmariel.

translation.en: -I'm getting Schmariel now. -Schmariel!
I'm getting her right now. Okay. All right.
Okay.
Are you okay?
You okay? You okay?
You're okay. You're okay.
translation.de: Es geht dir gut. Alles gut.

translation.en: Jesus Christ! She was in there?
translation.de: Mein Gott! Sie saß im Auto?

translation.en: Yes, my daughter was fucking in the car! She was in there, you fucking moron!
translation.de: Ja, meine Tochter saß im Scheißauto, du Vollidiot!

translation.en: You hit my fucking car. You could have killed my daughter.
translation.de: Du hast meinen Wagen angefahren. Du hättest sie umbringen können.

translation.en: Get the fuck away from me!
We live in here, you dipshit!
translation.de: Wir wohnen hier drin, du Vollpfosten!

translation.en: Oh, you're so good.
And then shine the light.
Yeah.
Here you go, ma'am.
-You're giving me a ticket? -Parking in the meridian is illegal.
translation.de: -Ich muss Strafe zahlen? -Auf dem Mittelstreifen ist Parkverbot.

translation.en: I can't pay for this.
If you have any personal items you'd like to retrieve from the car
translation.de: Wenn Sie noch etwas aus dem Auto holen wollen,

translation.en: before the tow truck gets here, now is your time.
translation.de: bevor es abgeschleppt wird, dann jetzt.

translation.en: And who pays for the tow truck?
You have someone who can pick you up?
If you don't have anybody to call, we can drop you at home.
translation.de: Wenn nicht, können wir Sie zu Hause abliefern.

translation.en: Um, no, no, no. I've got-- I've got somebody. Thank you so much.
translation.de: Nein, ich… Ich habe jemanden. Vielen Dank.

translation.en: Can you make the call now? I gotta clear the meridian.
translation.de: Rufen Sie da an? Der Mittelstreifen muss frei.

translation.en: -You can't stay here. All right. -Got it.
Were you speeding at the time?
[Hank] She's out like a light.
Last time I saw her, she was still in diapers.
translation.de: Letztes Mal trug sie noch Windeln.

translation.en: I would like to see her more than I get to.
translation.de: Ich würde sie gerne öfter sehen.

translation.en: So where to? Port Hampstead?
Sean still in that single-wide?
No, we're, um...
We're not gonna go home.
Oh. Okay.
Where to, then?
I mean, I'd invite you back to my house...
translation.de: Ich würde euch ja gerne zu mir einladen…

translation.en: but it's a school night, and Charlene and the kids--
translation.de: …aber morgen ist Schule, Charlene und die Kinder…

translation.en: No, yeah. Of course.
Maybe, um...
Would you mind just dropping us at the ferry station?
translation.de: Könntest du uns bei der Fähre abliefern?

translation.en: I'll have my friend pick us up.
translation.de: Da holt uns eine Freundin ab.

translation.en: What were you thinking pulled over like that?
translation.de: Wieso hast du überhaupt da angehalten?

translation.en: It's just that's... a reckless thing to do.
Reminds me of your mother.
Can we just not talk?
Okay.
Would you mind pulling over real quick and let me run to the dollar store?
translation.de: Können wir kurz beim Dollar-Laden anhalten?

translation.en: Thanks.
Let's put you down. There you go.
You, uh... You need anything else
from your old pop?
We're all set, thanks again.
Bye-bye, honey bee.
Boat.
No, not tonight. We're just gonna get a little rest in.
translation.de: Nein, jetzt nicht. Wir ruhen uns jetzt erst mal aus.

translation.en: Wait, wait. Come here, baby girl.
-This was in my shoe. -What's in your shoe?
-This was in my shoe. -What the heck?
What the heck?
Okay.
I put it in my shoe.
translation.de: Ich hab das in meinen Schuh getan.

translation.en: You're fixing my earrings, all right?
How do we unclip this?
Well...
Okey-dokey. I got you a surprise. You wanna see a surprise?
translation.de: Ok. Ich habe eine Überraschung. Willst du sie sehen?

translation.en: Okay.
Ta-da!
We got Schmariel.
All better.
[woman on PA] Announcing the arrival of Ferry 41.
Ferry 41 arriving.
